data.text: @nypost Is that seriously even a question at this point???
@nypost What a fukin joke! Any ass clown buying this is a brainwashed lobotomized sheep.
@CD3524 @johnny01927728 @nypost We ate them as snacks growing up

@WagnerYeager @nypost Rather, you should familiarize yourself with Occam's razor, common sense, and simple science. Instead of blaming this on some random bat that met 1 in a million conditions to set this off, you should look at poor housekeeping issues at the lab that resulted in this release. 😑
@Evershine07 @nypost Funny how just thinking you are right automatically is more powerful than all the data and evidence that shows that you are wrong.

@michca2112 @nypost Did it ever occur to you that the lab was studying Coronaviruses because of its proximity to newly forming Coronaviruses from local bat populations? 

Obviously not, because you jumped on the feel smart train. You are thinking a dock made the ocean.
